name: Alberich, the King of Elemental
text:
Continuous: This card gains [+200/+200] for each [Race:Elf] in your field.
Continuous: If you have five or more [Race:Elf] resonators in your field, this card gains Pierce.
Continuous: If you have three or more [Race:Elf] resonators in your field, this card gains Target Attack.
